scenario_text.value: Gah... Rrk...! Yooou...!!!
*huff* *huff*... Did we...do it?!
I don’t know... Something seems weird.

It doesn’t feel like we’ve done enough. If
anything...

...it’s more like he was hit by a sudden
pain.
Rrgh... You... Urgh... Gah...!
GAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!
Ooowaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!
The Master’s voice is...changing?

Hey, did that scream sound familiar?! I mean,
it can’t be, right?!

*cough* *cough* *wheeze*... Gah! *pant*
*pant* *pant*... Heh. Heheh.

Heheheh... Ahahahaha!!! See? Now we have an
understanding. I did it! I really did it!

I have taken in the Master himself! He’s
fusing with the others inside me!
I was right!!! Yes! Me! Ahahahaha!!!

Takuma, this...this isn’t right! What’s
happening?!

It...it sounds like Aoi...took control of the
Master!
No... No, this is all wrong!
Why... Why is this happening?!
It’s thanks to all of you.
Aoi?

Listen, Takuma, Minoru, Kaito, Miu... You
too, Professor, and everyone else...
Thank you for helping me. Really, thank you.

(What’s going on? My whole body is
shivering...all because Aoi said thank you?)
(What is this rush of emotions?)

I could never have merged with the Master if
it weren’t for you. You weakened him.
I knew you would.

I knew you’d feel bad for me and want to get
revenge on the Master for taking me in.
Are...are you serious?

And just as I hoped, you grew angry at my
loss and fought hard to defeat the Master.

That weakened him and loosened his hold on
me until now...I am free!
(So, all of this was...part of Aoi’s plan?)
No... Oh no...
That’s just... That’s not even fair...

I don’t think I could have done it on my own.
Yes, it’s so good to have friends.

I really do care for all of you so very much.
I should do something for you, shouldn’t I?

Yes, I will happily welcome you all into my
new world! Isn’t that wonderful? Hee hee!

(Aoi is...gone. This isn’t the Aoi that we
all knew. There’s nothing left of her.)

(All that’s left now...is a monster who wants
to destroy both worlds.)
(I can’t believe it’s come to this...)
Takuma! Takuma, stay strong!

You too, Kaito! Don’t just stand there
gaping!
Miu, get up! We haven’t lost just yet!
Minoru, please, do not lose heart!

My friends...has your pain at being used by
Aoi left you so shaken?

I think that’s enough talking. Yes,
everything’s prepped and ready to go!

Now I can make all one. Here, let me show you
my new power!
...Hah!
Takuma, look! Something just...opened up!
Hm?

It’s just like when Miyuki sang that song...
Is that the door between worlds?!

This could send us back to our world,
couldn’t it? Why show us this?
Oh, if you’d like to go back, you can.
Wait...really? I don’t get it.

You see, it doesn’t really matter where you
are anymore. It won’t change anything.
It won’t?

That’s right. When the Master and I came to
our understanding, I learned a great deal.

Did you see the mural? This world and ours,
humans and Kemonogami... Once all were one.

Don’t you think things should go back to how
they were? I can do that. I should do that.

Yes, what I’m trying to do is right! I will
make it happen! I will fix the worlds!

When all become one, struggles will cease!
People won’t need to fear each other!
No... No, Aoi, that’s not right...

Listen! Can’t you hear them?! Shuuji, Ryo,
and Saki are all calling out for you!

Oh, hey... I do hear their voices. I’m not...
just hearing things, am I?

No, I hear them too. So, this is Aoi’s power
now that she’s taken over the Master?
You hear them, don’t you?

(Yes, I can hear their voices all right.
But...this is wrong!)

Aoi, can’t you hear that they’re suffering?
They’re not calling out to us...
They’re crying out in pain!

You think they’re suffering?! That can’t be.
After all, I’ve never felt better in my life!

I’ll show you how wrong you are. Come and
join me, won’t you?

I was thinking of returning you to your
world, but you need to realize your mistake.
No, you can’t mean...
Yes. Let us all become one.
Damn it! Is this what it comes down to?!

Takuma! We can’t afford to die here! We have
to take her out!
Yeah... This is it!

Agumon, everyone... Come on! Let’s fight
together to the bitter end!
You got it!!!
